skill.summary: Generates documentation files including NotebookLM YAML and slide content. Use when user mentions ãƒ‰ã‚­...
skill.author: Chachamaru127

security_audit.summary: Pure prompt-based documentation skill with no executable code. Contains only markdown files defining YAML templates for NotebookLM slide generation. No network, filesystem, or command execution capabilities beyond Claude Code's built-in Read/Write tools.

content.value_statement: Creating professional presentation designs for NotebookLM requires precise YAML configuration. This skill generates two distinct design variations with specific color palettes, typography rules, and layout templates.
actual_capabilities: Generates NotebookLM YAML design specifications with color palettes and typography rules
Creates two distinct design variations: Minimal/Corporate and Editorial/Story styles
Produces layout catalogs with specific slide type templates
Includes design rules and NGäº‹é¡¹ for consistent output quality
Outputs Japanese YAML formatted for direct NotebookLM paste
limitations: Only generates YAML configurations, does not create actual presentations
Requires NotebookLM subscription and slide customization feature
Design quality depends on user-provided context about purpose and audience

use_cases.title: Corporate Presentation Design
use_cases.description: Generate professional, data-focused YAML designs for quarterly reviews and board presentations

use_cases.title: Brand-Aligned Slides
use_cases.description: Create branded presentation configurations that match company visual identity guidelines

use_cases.title: Educational Materials
use_cases.description: Design clear, readable slide templates for lectures and training sessions

best_practices: Provide specific context about audience, purpose, and tone for best results
Use the generated YAML directly in NotebookLM slide customization without modification
Generate both variations and compare which fits your content better
anti_patterns: Using without specifying audience or purpose leads to generic results
Mixing design elements from both YAML variants reduces consistency
Ignoring the NGäº‹é … and design rules sections causes inconsistent output

faq.question: Which NotebookLM plans support this skill?
faq.answer: NotebookLM Plus subscription is required for slide customization with YAML files

faq.question: How many design variations are generated?
faq.answer: Two distinct variations are always generated: Minimal/Corporate and Editorial/Story

faq.question: Can I combine elements from both YAML versions?
faq.answer: It is not recommended as mixing styles reduces visual consistency across slides

faq.question: Is my data sent to external servers?
faq.answer: No. This skill only generates YAML templates locally within Claude Code environment

faq.question: Why do I need to provide brand colors?
faq.answer: Brand-specific colors ensure the generated YAML produces slides that match your identity

faq.question: What is the difference between the two design variations?
faq.answer: æ¡ˆA prioritizes readability and data presentation. æ¡ˆB focuses on emotional storytelling with more whitespace
